summary: A utility class that reads common 2D image files (PNG, JPG, BMP) using the Pillow library, optionally applies a user‑provided conversion function, and can reorder the spatial axes to match downstream processing conventions while exposing the image data through a simple getter.
business_intent: Enable consistent and configurable ingestion of raster image data into image analysis or computer‑vision pipelines, reducing boilerplate code for format handling, preprocessing, and axis alignment.
